name: @xprofiler/all-in-one
description: startup of all projects with one script

scripts.dev:console: cross-env EZM_ENV=local DISABLE_MANAGER=YES DISABLE_WSSERVER=YES nodemon index.js
scripts.dev:manager: cross-env EZM_ENV=local DISABLE_CONSOLE=YES DISABLE_WSSERVER=YES nodemon index.js
scripts.dev:wsserver: cross-env EZM_ENV=local DISABLE_CONSOLE=YES DISABLE_MANAGER=YES nodemon index.js
scripts.start:console: cross-env DISABLE_MANAGER=YES DISABLE_WSSERVER=YES pm2 start index.js --name ezmconsole
scripts.start:manager: cross-env DISABLE_CONSOLE=YES DISABLE_WSSERVER=YES pm2 start index.js --name ezmmanager
scripts.start:wsserver: cross-env DISABLE_CONSOLE=YES DISABLE_MANAGER=YES pm2 start index.js --name ezmwsserver

author: hyj1991 <yeekwanvong@gmail.com>
